name: secrets-safe-secret-retrieval
description: Retrieve secrets from BeyondTrusts DevOps Secrets Safe.
helpMarkDown: Retrieve a given secret from Secrets Safe by providing instance configuration and authentication details.
author: BeyondTrust

inputs.name: secretsSafeHost
inputs.label: Secrets Safe hostname/IP
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the hostname/IP of the Secrets Safe instance.

inputs.name: secretsSafePort
inputs.label: Secrets Safe port
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the port of the Secrets Safe instance.

inputs.name: apiVersion
inputs.label: Secrets Safe API version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the version of the Secrets Safe instances API.

inputs.name: requestTimeout
inputs.label: Request timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the socket timeout in milliseconds. This will set the timeout before the socket is disconnected.

inputs.name: verifyServerCertificate
inputs.label: Verify server certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Signifies whether the server certificate is verified against the list of supplied CAs.

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: Application name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the application name of the requesting principal.

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the API key of the requesting application.

inputs.name: secretUri
inputs.label: URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies URI of the secret in which to retrieve.

inputs.name: variableName
inputs.label: Variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the pipeline variable name to assign the secret content to.
